entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Marshal.Copy throws SEHException on Arm64. #83626
  • Add tests for src generated IServiceCollection.Configure implementations #83621
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] Dead code might not be eliminated early enough #83620
  • [API Proposal]: Support binary format specifier 'b' and 'B' (standard numeric format strings) #83619
  • ARM64 - Investigate why a `mov` is inserted #83618
  • Static tests in abstract classes aren't running #83617
  • createdump is added to Mac app bundles #83613
  • [NativeAOT] Optionally compile unmanaged runtime at application build time #83611
    Future
  • Lock contention in LoggerFactory.CreateLogger #83609
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT SetCreateObject on JsonTypeInfo<T> could be slimmed down #83608
  • Support all applicable ConfigurationBinder method overloads in binding generator #83600
    8.0.0
  • Decide whether to support TypeConverter usage in config binding source generator #83599
    8.0.0
  • Consider replacing custom config binding logic in console logging with use of binding source generator #83598
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add analyzer for Environment.SystemDirectory #83591
  • [mono][llvm] Unify *All and *Any SIMD intrinsics with mini implementations #83588
    Future
  • [mono] Add option for experimental SIMD support in JIT #83587
    8.0.0
  • [browser][icu] Enable custom ICU loading for Blazor #83585
  • ILLink reports duplicate warnings from properties in some cases #83581
  • [nodejs][ws] CancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException unit test failure #83579
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->IsCall() || tree->OperIs(GT_COMMA)' during 'Stress gtSplitTree' #83576
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\debugging\\debuginfo\\tester\\tester.cmd #83575
  • can't load XmlSerializer lib on .Net 6.0 and .Net 7.0 #83572
  • Short time format is missing space under en_US on Fedora 38+ #83571
    8.0.0
  • System.Console.Clear() sometimes did not clear the console buffer. #83568
  • read mem.stat.hierarchical_memory_limit when looking for the memory limit #83563
    8.0.0

Closed

  • System.Net native crash in mono linux x64 #83481
  • Fix HostActivation additional probing path tests after moving to 3.0 SDK as part of Arcadification #3654
    Future
  • [Blazor WASM] System.InvalidProgramException: Unable to run method 'void Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Language.Legacy.ParserHelpers:.cctor ()': locals size too big. #83260
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] BinSkim - EnableControlFlowGuard #83603
    8.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][arm64] Optimize "x<0" and "x>=0" #43440
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm Debugging Crashes on Startup #83521
  • [API Proposal]: Adding ForEach method for IEnumerable<T> #83601
  • CreateFromEncryptedPem fails with valid PEM/KEY files #83594
  • Suboptimal codegen for memset/memcpy unrolling #83277
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 breaking change in HttpClient timeout handling #82878
  • HttpResponseHeaders.Location can throw InvalidCastException #82943
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice failure #82837
    8.0.0
  • Test failure:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice #57187
    Future
  • Http/Quic tests are crashing on Windows #83110
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve RA for LowerBlockStore #83627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] experiment - Ignore PHI nodes for `IfConversion` phase #83625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Avoid clearing uncommitted mark array #83623
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: stop copying EH tab info into inlinee compiler #83622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ToString handling of [Flags] enums with negative values #83616
  • Correct formatting of config binder generator #83614
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: revise inlinee block numbering, enable synthesis for inlinees #83610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add a --experimental-jit-simd option to turn on the unfin… #83606
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Include args in hostfxr entry point tracing #83605
    area-Host
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83602
    area-System.Net
  • [draft][browser] JSObject thread affinity assertions #83596
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Escape sequence instead of unicode #83595
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use Environment.SystemDirectory from GetFolderPath(System) on Windows #83593
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Eliminate commas early in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ConvertIcuTimeFormatString: convert narrow no-break spaces to spaces too. #83589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Extend mstat format with information that maps to dependency nodes #83578
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Merged

  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #83420
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • [wasm] Various jiterpreter optimizations; implement CALL_HANDLER; don't abort for some icalls #83322
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Switch tests for --additionalprobingpath to mocked components #83541
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [mono][interp] Correctly track livness of vars used with MINT_MOV_8_* #83597
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify max/min on ARM64 with mini JIT #83468
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83559
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Rename VirtualMethodTableManagedImplementation and add manual CCW to test generated RCW #83285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Fix dotnet.withRuntimeOptions #83586
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: profile synthesis blend and repair modes #83567
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] disable memorySnapshot for WS test #83583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use Environment.SystemDirectory to get system directory #83564
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Runtime lookup clean up, enable for helper-based tail calls #83430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • [node][ws] Active issue: CancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException #83580
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix advanced sample for MT #83582
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Slightly improve struct zeroing & copying #83488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use nameof in attributes #83566
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Implement rotate left/right immediate interp intrinsics in jiterpreter; implement clz/ctz/popcnt #83573
    area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83480
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Post 3.1.30 emscripten bump feedback #83391
    8.0.0
  • Revert "ActiveIssue for BuildInvalidSignatureTwice on mono interpreter." #83542
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Allow a single call when inlining methods #83548
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix System.Management wminet_utils.dll lookup code for arm64 #83549
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Management, 7.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Management wminet_utils.dll lookup code for arm64 #83546
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Management, 6.0.16
  • update msquic #83493
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix Wrong Date Format in Test Logs #83553
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Merge binary perf with big endian #83561
    area-Serialization
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve and enable writing test wrappers to disk #83444
    test-enhancement
  • [android][ios] Add SDK and workload to support library mode #83487
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Unity managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono] Intrinsify As* on ARM64 with mini JIT #83544
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update xarch to track more instruction metadata as flags #83473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix reflection invoke file format issue for generic methods #83438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove double quotes from OwnerCompositeExecutable #83552
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Load AOT module of a container assembly using assembly name #83511
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup some HWIntrinsic logic to ensure the right gtType and simdSize are being set #83516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Support exporting methods from referenced assemblies in a formal way #83396
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • don't load MsQuic unless needed by HttpClient #83494
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [tests] Retain OutDir for ioslike tests #82313
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83510
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Calling static virtual method in interface #83556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement checking for Requires* on attributes for NativeAOT #83550
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding compare all/any intrinsics. #83515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [test] Try to use nodejs instead of v8 #83524
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add LinkerFlavor to NativeAOT #83558
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • use ROSpan in SslStreamCertificateContext #83485
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/7.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #83557
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter monitoring phase take 2 #83489
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnableAotAnalyzer=true should also default EnableSingleFileAnalyzer=true #31284
  • Improve workload list to work better with VS and other SDK bands #31283
    8.0.1xx
  • Improve workload repair to actually fix a customers installation and manifests #31282
    8.0.1xx
  • .NET developers have an improved containerization experience #31281
    8.0.1xx
  • Blazor wasm client fails to start when PublishTrimmed=true and built using 7.0.201 and above #31269

Closed

  • SDK acquisition improvements #23356
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31286
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Experimental] Check if Helix queue works for tests #31272
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31262
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust artifacts location to adapt tests running locally and on Helix #31276
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Emit AssemblyVersion and ReferenceAssembly assembly attributes #31275
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Move RDG omission to ResolveTargetingPackAssets target #31265
    Area-AspNetCore
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • Files not ending in css are probably not css files #23086
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter #31174
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [WIP] Add unit test for the TypeForwardedTo assembly attributes. #31252
    Area-GenAPI
  • [Experimental] Fix test failures caused by adjusting path of artifacts and the target framework of templates in built SDK #31239
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Public LSP Handler API that provides Roslyn context #67363
  • Question: CodeFixProvider for diagnostics reported by IIncrementalGenerator #67354

Closed

  • Can a source generator reference itself as an analyzer? #67357
  • Diagnostic reported on property symbol name shouldn't be classified as a non-local diagnostic #67310
  • UseAutoProperty analyzer needs to be rewritten as a SymbolStart/End analyzer #67350
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "module initializers" feature #40500
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch and resolve conflicts around primary constructors #67362
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2138129 #67361
  • Improve props in readonly struct #67360
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update AbstractEditorFactory to implement IVsEditorFactoryChooser #67358
    Area-IDE
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67355
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Exclude non-local diagnostics by default in legacy test framework for analyzer/code fix unit tests #67351
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update 'use auto property' to be a symbol-start/end analyzer instead of a semantic-model analyzer. #67353
    Next
  • Move to new binary logger NuGet #67356
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add tests for local/non-local diagnostic classification for accessor block #67312
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Semantic snippets - `enum` snippet #67184
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Rename codefix predefined name #67345
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix CSharpMakeStructMemberReadOnlyDiagnosticAnalyzer to report local diagnostic #67352
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Improve error recovery while parsing switch expressions. #67340
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Experimenting with compiler logs #67349
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Simplify creation of unbound generic types #67343
    Area-Compilers
  • Support generating records in syntax generator #67337
    Area-IDE
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2137261 #67346
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #66050
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APIs for identity management #47288
    .NET 8.0
  • Consider in-repo documentation for diagnostic codes used in repo #47287
  • Auth improvements in ASP.NET Core 8 #47286
    .NET 8.0
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #47284
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47283
  • Getting ArgumentOutOfRangeException when accessing a list by index within HTML class attribute #47281
  • Blazor Server using MSI and EFCore #47279
  • Minmal .NET API - Delegate 'RequestDelegate' does not take 0 arguments #47275
  • Blazor Custom Elements Documentation Vanished #47273

Closed

  • Add Route Short Circuit middleware #46071
    8.0-preview4
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint definition #46985
    8.0-preview3
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint metadata and integration with ASP.NET #46984
    8.0-preview3
  • ProblemHttpResult should use custom defaults #47045
    .NET 8 Planning
  • How to configure specific paths for an endpoint different from others? #47257
  • Ability to monitor circuit activity #30287
    8.0-preview3
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #47160
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint registration #46982
    8.0-preview3
  • Blazor Sections API Proposal #46937
    8.0-preview3
  • Cannot load PDBs for Microsoft.AspNetCore within .Net 7.0.3 #47113
  • GetFolderPath call in Hosting negatively affects startup performance #47269
  • Quarantine MapAction_JsonBodyOrService_HandlesBothJsonAndService #47274
  • Possible request delegate generator bug with non-valid C# identifier names #47129
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: json #47263
  • adding PhysicalFileProvider causes 404 on other static files #47136
  • Generate self-signed certificate for local domain when debugging in Visual Studio #47186
  • [AOT] Publish gRPC app as Native AOT with no warnings #45888
    8.0-preview3
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47224
    8.0-preview3
  • SignalR - Clients Not Receiving Messages in Integration Tests #47260

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TypedResults.Extentensions #47285
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable SingleFileAnalyzer #47282
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed duplicate LoggerMessage EventNames in RemoteJSRuntime.cs file #47280
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47277
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3

Merged

  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] Endpoint discovery #47126
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `50e07d1` to `e49c6b9` #47276
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Add LookupName to EndpointParameter. #47272
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ProblemHttpResult #47100
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview3
  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Add SectionName to SectionOutlet and SectionContent #47221
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Use Environment.SystemDirectory to get system directory #47271
    area-hosting, 8.0-preview3
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • DbContextHealthCheck handles exceptions thrown by CustomTestQuery #47121
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix x86 folder contents in ARM64 Windows Server Hosting Bundle installer #47124
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • User Story: .NET developers have a first-class experience for observability using Open Telemetry in their applications #3762
  • User Story: Cloud Native developers have the tools to be able to collect traces and dumps in container environments and perform 1st level analysis on them #3761
  • lldb dumpmt crashes against source-built .NET 7 on Fedora 37 #3757
  • Epic: .NET Developers have a great observability & diagnostics experience for cloud-native applications #3756
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Graphical objects should be drawn from Righ To Left when FlowDirection is RightToLeft #14038
  • RegisterForActivityResult does not work #14037
  • canvas.DrawImage from originally CVPixelBuffer is not visible #14034
  • Remove solution files from maui templates #14033
  • User Story: As a developer I have an efficient inner loop building .NET MAUI apps #14032
    .NET 8
  • User Story: As a developer I can build apps with Xcode 15 and .NET 8 #14030
    .NET 8
  • User Story: As a developer I can build apps with Xcode 14.x and .NET 8 #14029
    .NET 8
  • User Story: As a developer I can use up-to-date versions of AndroidX and GPS in .NET 8 #14028
    .NET 8
  • TableSection TextColor NullReferenceException in Mac #14027
  • User Story: As a developer I can build applications with Android API 34 #14026
    .NET 8
  • [Windows] Semantic hint not announced from Stepper #14023
  • Epic: Features for creating excellent desktop user experiences #14022
    .NET 8
  • As a desktop developer I can support advanced keyboard interactions #14021
    .NET 8
  • Epic: .NET MAUI developers are successful in ensuring the quality of their applications #14019
    .NET 8
  • Epic: Mobile developers can leverage the latest platform SDKs and libraries with .NET #14018
    .NET 8
  • MAUI template does not available on visual studio 2022 for mac #14017
  • User Story: Xamarin developers are successful using .NET Upgrade Assistant #14016
    .NET 8
  • Epic: Xamarin developers are able to upgrade their projects to .NET 8 #14015
    .NET 8
  • Theme: Delight developers building client and mobile applications with .NET 8 #14014
    .NET 8
  • Deploying to iOS crashes with System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14011
  • Easy way to get Color from Colors.xaml #14007
  • Add IsVisible property to Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Cell #14004
    Backlog
  • 在Resources设置Label的VerticalTextAlignment属性导致程序崩溃,报错Value does not fall within the expected range. #14003
  • MAUI Template not showing up in VS 17.5.2 #14001
  • OnNavigatedTo is not called when navigating from a specific page #14000

Closed

  • Shapes on Android don't support Horizontal/VerticalOptions #9433
    Backlog
  • Entry and Switch in a Grid #6292
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasConversion with ForeignKey breaks the model #30518
  • Query: JSON collection issues incorrect warning CompositeKeyWithValueGeneration #30516
    8.0.0
  • System.InvalidCastException when calling ToQueryString #30515
  • Migration bundles does not work in the context of MySQL database and CICD pipeline in Github Action #30514
  • Ef core 6 Cosmos provider owned types with "Id" property is mapped as parent entities partition key #30513

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #30516 - Query: JSON collection issues incorrect warning CompositeKeyWithValueGeneration #30517

Updated

  • Add readme for EF core Nuget Package #30469

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Not clear which 32bit/64bit version of Core should be installed. #4531
    Discussion
  • Warn users if using .NET Core 3.0 with VS older than 16.3 #4410
  • Set up patching process for .NET Core 3.0 #4002
  • Port AspNetCore E2E tests into this repo #247
  • Provide nightlies for Windows ARM64 #2068
  • Add test coverage that installers include the same contents as the archives #3399
  • Fix up templates for 5.0 #3856
  • Re-enable end-2-end testing for RPM and DEB #1174
  • Installation success screen for Windows x86 SDK installer shows wrong installation path #11713
  • Self-contained publish failing with error NU1605: Detected package downgrade: Microsoft.NETCore.App from 2.1.2 to 2.1.0 #81
    Discussion
  • issues with documentations about installing 3.0 sdk on Ubuntu. #219

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15857
  • Assume recursive installer sync when no `vmr-sync.sh` arguments #15854

Merged

  • Generate version for Roslyn packages #15216
  • Update SB version info for 8.0 Preview 2 release #15851
  • Revert "Update SB version info for 8.0 Preview 2 release (#15851)" #15856
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #15845
  • Update SB prebuilt tarball version #15855
  • Add version property for Roslyn #15843
  • Use consistent packages across platforms for bootstrap #15823
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15817
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #15826

Updated

  • [DRAFT] Disable TFM filtering #15842
    WIP, Area-SourceBuild
  • Backport: Shutdown build servers for each SB repo project #15755
    Area-SourceBuild
